message: Let's start with a reasonable offer, Bob. I take 60% and you take 40%.
I think a 55/45 split is fairer. Let's get this done quickly.
Bob, time is literally money!  I'm coming down to 58%, but this is my final offer.
I'm willing to compromise further, but I need to see a bit more on my end. 52/48 is my final offer.
